resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102932</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102932</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Support and elaboration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Support und Ausarbeitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Support et élaboration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sustentação e elaboration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Supporto ed elaborazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποστήριξη και επεξεργασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ayuda y elaboración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Support and Elaboration, the third Feature of Effective Writing, is how a writer fleshes out a piece of writing with specific, relevant details.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Support und Ausarbeitung, das dritte Merkmal des 
wirkungsvollen Schreibens, ist wie ein Verfasser fleshes aus einem 
Stück des Schreibens mit den spezifischen, relevanten Details.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le support et l'élaboration, le troisième 
dispositif de l'écriture pertinente, est comment des fleshes d'un 
auteur hors d'un morceau d'inscription avec les détails spécifiques 
et appropriés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A sustentação e o elaboration, a terceira 
característica da escrita eficaz, são como fleshes de um escritor 
para fora de uma parte de escrita com detalhes específicos, 
relevantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il supporto e l'elaborazione, la terza 
caratteristica di scrittura efficace, è come fleshes del produttore 
verso l'esterno una parte di scrittura con i particolari specifici e 
relativi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η υποστήριξη και η επεξεργασία, το τρίτο 
χαρακτηριστικό γνώρισμα του αποτελεσματικού γραψίματος, είναι 
πώς ένας συγγραφέας σκληραγωγεί έξω ένα κομμάτι του γραψίματος
με τις συγκεκριμένες, σχετικές λεπτομέρειες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ayuda y la elaboración, la tercera 
característica de la escritura eficaz, es cómo los fleshes de un 
programa de escritura fuera de un pedazo de escribir con los detalles 
específicos, relevantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHLEEN CALI
FN:KATHLEEN CALI
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102932</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/support-and-elaboration</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
